short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TeamCity Helper is a web extension which adds some additional functionality to the TeamCity UI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What problem does it solve?
When you use TeamCity on the everyday basis you face lacking features in the TeamCity UI. For example, when you work with triggers you often need possibility to copy triggers, but you TeamCity doesn't provide this function. It is not critical, but it takes some time to create new trigger and fill it's card. 

For more information visit: https://github.com/Ceridan/teamcity-helper-extension

Version 1.1.0
- Update extension functionality to support TeamCity 2018.1

Version 1.0.1 - Supported features:
- Inline screenshots for failed tests
- Trigger copy function (REST API authorization required)
